description: थप गर्नु  is also correct. But we are using थप्नु for consistency.
संग्रह, सङ्ग्रह are also correct but use अभिलेख for consistency.
बाण is also correct but use वाण for consistency.
प्रतिक्रिया is not correct. response = प्रतिक्रिया
सृजना गर्नु is also correct but we are not using it here due to consistency.
फारम is also correct but use फाराम for consistency.
संकेत is also correct but we are using सङ्केत for consistency.
Please use appropriate translation based on context.
Please use the word carefully understanding the context.
प्रख्यात is not correct. प्रख्यात = famous
Eg, up to date list -> नवीनतम नामावली
